title: Safe in the water
brief_description: Water should be fun and if the rules are observed you can be safe in the water. Dramatised episodes show the most frequent causes of water accidents involving children. Details precautions that should be taken, and rescue techniques. Emphasises the importance of learning to swim at an early age. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
